title: Kingdom's End
description: Royal Sagas 4: King James to CromwellWith Elizabeth's wedding desecrated and one of Coudenoure's own viciously murdered, the de Grey's are thrust from their home in the dead of night and scattered to the four winds. From Scotland to Oxford to London and finally to the borders of their beloved estate, the family and their allies must risk all and pledge all to a new patron in order to regain what is rightfully theirs. Share the trials and joys of this courageous family as they defy all odds to regain their life in the storied halls of Coudenoure. The saga of the de Grey clan continues.
author: Betty Younis
